response.original_title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse: MAGA: The Next Generation
response.overview: “The Daily Show” tackles the curious case of young Maga voters in a special episode airing this Monday. Following the 2024 election, where Donald Trump performed better with voters under 30 than any Republican since 2008, correspondent Jordan Klepper sets out to understand this surprising demographic trend
response.title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse: MAGA: The Next Generation
